description: Cinema 4D is a powerful tool in the motion graphics industry. Throughout this course we will go over basic and advanced skills and techniques in Cinema 4D. From the basic user interface of Cinema to complex texturing and animation. We will also be creating projects that will also further your understanding of Cinema 4D. These projects will go over different techniques that I use in my projects. By the end of this course you will be able to create stunning 3D visuals for live performance and other applications. You will also be able to use Cinema 4d in your workflow.
title: Cinema 4D: Creating Content and Visuals for Live Performance
